long_description: Subtle stripes, a crossover V-neck and a cozy cotton/polyester blend make the girls' REI Kristina wrap top a cute and comfortable shirt for school days or play time. Cotton/polyester blend is breathable and easy to care for. Raglan sleeves allow non-binding range of motion.
short_description: Subtle stripes, a crossover V-neck and a cozy cotton/polyester blend make the girls' REI Kristina wrap top a cute and comfortable shirt for school days or play time.
